distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

msIdentifier.repository: Archives & Special Collections, University of Nebraska-Lincoln Libraries

div1.p: Note from editor: This document contains offensive imagery about Native Americans. It is being published not to perpetuate this harm, but to acknowledge the band's past of performances featuring this type of content.
March into CODY on drums on Davy Crocket - kneel, Rise on propaganda from Holly - Wood
March to PANTHER on P. A. Song - sing chorus after text. Tiger Rag (trombone down on 1, band up on 4)
Walk - Swagger, to HAT AND BOOT on text. Kneel on command - Play El Rancho Grande - up on "boots like Bill Wore." Intro plus 16 meas. Plus G chord.
March to SADDLE on on P. A. Song - sing chorus - Text. "Lay Pony Boy - Gallop into COACH on 2nd. Verse. Text - Move 5 yds - 32 beats of Wagon Wheels at A
BUFFALO - March into P. A. Song - Kneel on command. Text - "Buff. Bill" Home on the Range at 4

BOW AND ARROW - run like indians - war hoops Text - "The bow is pulled" - 8 counts "The arrow flies" - 4 counts
March to PEACE PIPE on Ten Little Indians Kneel on command "calm"
Smoke - Land of Sky Blue Waters
Circus-STEER - March into at 200 Fanfare - El Rancho Grande - Form TEEPEE on Trampoline Act - (I'm a Forever Blowin8 Bubbles) Drums play for Ind. Dance

PRECISION DRILL - Intro of piece 12 meas. To hash ranks 1-2-11-12 start on 9th meas.
I Thunder and Blazes Trio - into X
II Circles, Trio United Nations 16 meas.
III Triangle - last 16 meas. Trio United States
IV National Emblem Trio - 16 meas start on Bone meas.
V " " " next 16 meas.
VI 1. 8 meas - let me Call You Sweetheart face 8 2 3
2. Alex. Rag
3. " " Faster
4. Gallop
VII Flirtations
32 cnts VIII Back to IV - United Nation - start 9th meas
16 counts IX Continue United Nations
COMPANY FRONT - Glory of the Gridiron
X 24 measures - start 11th meas where cornets come in, play to end. Natl. Emblem
XI ditto
XII Band Song In Place
